travelplanapp.travelplanapp

Class AlbumTaskDispatcher

  • java.lang.Object
    • travelplanapp.travelplanapp.AlbumTaskDispatcher

  • @Path(value="/album")
public class AlbumTaskDispatcher
extends java.lang.Object
    AlbumTaskDispatcher is a class in charge of dispatching tasks related to Album and photos. The methods in this class consume HTTP POST requests including create/delete albums, add/delete photos and dispatch tasks to process these request, add tasks to task queue. *
    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yanhong Ju

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void deleteAlbum(java.lang.String albumName, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Consumes a HttpRequest with information about albumName and produce a deleteAlbum task using the information.
      void deletePhoto(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Consumes a HttpRequest with albumName and blobKey of the photo to be deleted.
      void newalbum(java.lang.String albumName, java.lang.String notes, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Consumes a HttpRequest with submitted form including information about albumName and notes and produce a newAlbum task using the information.
      void newPhoto(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request, javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
      Consumes a HttpRequest with information about uploaded photos, get BlobKeys for all uploaded photos.

    • Method Detail

      • newalbum

        @POST
@Path(value="/newalbum")
@Consumes(value="application/x-www-form-urlencoded")
public void newalbum(@FormParam(value="albumName")
                               java.lang.String albumName,
                               @FormParam(value="notes")
                               java.lang.String notes,
                               @Context
                               javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with submitted form including information about albumName and notes and produce a newAlbum task using the information. Add task to task queue and the redirect the httpResponse to pages where users can upload photos.
        Parameters:
        albumName - the name of the album to be created
        notes - notes about the new album *
        response - HttpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • deleteAlbum

        @GET
@Path(value="/deletealbum/{albumName}")
public void deleteAlbum(@PathParam(value="albumName")
                        java.lang.String albumName,
                        @Context
                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with information about albumName and produce a deleteAlbum task using the information. Add task to task queue and the redirect the httpResponse to pages where users can view all albums.
        Parameters:
        albumName - the name of the album to be deleted
        response - HttpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • newPhoto

        @POST
@Path(value="/upload")
public void newPhoto(@Context
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                      @Context
                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
              throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with information about uploaded photos, get BlobKeys for all uploaded photos. Produce one task for each blobkey and add tasks to task queue. Redirect the httpResponse to pages where users can view all photos in this gallery.
        Parameters:
        request - httpRequest to be processed
        response - HttpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0

      • deletePhoto

        @POST
@Path(value="/deletephoto")
public void deletePhoto(@Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                         @Context
                         javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Consumes a HttpRequest with albumName and blobKey of the photo to be deleted. Produce one deletePhoto task and add task to task queue. Redirect the httpResponse to pages where users can view all photos in the current album.
        Parameters:
        request - httpRequest to be processed
        response - HttpResponse to redirect
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
        Since:
        1.0
